description: This file defines the BudgetProvider class, a ChangeNotifier that manages fetching and storing budget data from an API in a Flutter application.

classes.name: BudgetProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages the state for budget data, including fetching from API, loading status, and error handling.

methods.name: fetchBudgets
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches budgets from the API endpoint '/budgets', updates the internal list, and notifies listeners.
